general.title: Beyond Solutions – Fiber 2025
general.description: Beyond is a digital platform designed to strategically integrate and manage all elements that make up a world-class real estate development.

hero.title: Beyond is a digital platform designed to strategically integrate and manage all elements that make up a world-class real estate development.
hero.subtitle: Through solutions based on automation, artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning (ML), and advanced big data analysis.

modelo.title: Model
modelo.intro: The model encompasses the comprehensive orchestration of land, materials, architecture, design, art, regulations, construction, and development, with the goal of efficiently enabling the operation and commercialization of real estate assets nationally and internationally.

items.title: Land and Materials
items.desc: Strategic identification of supplies based on the construction site, ensuring availability, efficiency, and optimal transport times.

items.title: Architecture, Design and Art
items.desc: Incorporation of innovative architectural proposals with high-value design and art integration.

items.title: Regulatory and Legal
items.desc: Comprehensive regulatory compliance allowing processes to be carried out in a timely manner, minimizing risks.

items.title: Construction and Development
items.desc: Efficient execution through digitalization and global collaboration of strategic partners, redefining standards in the real estate sector.

items.title: Marketing
items.desc: Market strategies based on big data for precise segmentation and effective commercialization in B2B and B2C schemes.

items.title: Operation
items.desc: Professional administration and maintenance oriented towards maximizing operational efficiency and profitability of real estate assets.

items.title: PURPOSEFUL DESIGN AND WELLBEING
items.desc: Architecture, art, and materials that elevate daily life, creating spaces with meaning and connection to their environment.

items.title: TECHNOLOGY AND OPERATIONAL EFFICIENCY
items.desc: Automation, data, and operational excellence that optimize processes, reduce costs, and improve quality at every stage of development.

items.title: SOCIAL AND ENVIRONMENTAL COMMITMENT
items.desc: Responsible construction with positive impact, respecting labor and environmental standards, and promoting sustainability and equity.

items.title: RESIDENTIAL
items.desc: Exclusive and sustainable lifestyle, where design, technology, and art integrate to provide unique experiences with quality and comfort.

items.title: RESTORATION AND RECONVERSION
items.desc: High-end restoration that merges advanced conservation and contemporary design, preserving historical value and enhancing functionality.

items.title: EDUCATION, ART AND CULTURE
items.desc: Spaces that promote education, art, and culture, combining modern architecture, technology, and design to foster creativity, learning, and artistic expression.

items.title: COMMERCIAL AND INDUSTRIAL
items.desc: Dynamic environments that combine design, technology, and data to optimize user experience, profitability, and real estate performance.

items.title: Land – Intelligent Acquisition
items.desc: Through advanced big data analysis, derived parameters, and technology such as augmented reality and satellite views, we strategically identify and evaluate land globally. We consider factors such as land use, climate, topography, sustainability, and innovative materials to maximize the value of each development according to its geolocation.

items.title: Materials – Redefining the Supply Chain
items.desc: We optimize the supply chain through advanced technology, real-time traceability, and selection of sustainable and high-performance materials. Our direct procurement strategy with manufacturers maximizes efficiency, reduces costs, and ensures quality.

items.title: Architecture – Avant-garde and High Impact
items.desc: We design urban spaces that integrate disruptive modernism with functionality, aesthetics, and energy efficiency. Our developments interact intelligently with their environment, promoting sustainability and well-being. We comply with the highest international standards, obtaining certifications such as LEED, WELL, EDGE, and PASSIVE, guaranteeing quality, environmental responsibility, and long-term value.

items.title: Design – Adaptability, Technology, Experience
items.desc: We develop modular and customizable spaces that adapt to market trends and changing user needs. We integrate artificial intelligence, 3D simulations, and digital tools to optimize design and create high-value residential and commercial experiences, redefining standards in the real estate industry.

items.title: Art – Curation, Identity, Experience
items.desc: We merge art and architecture through exclusive curation of original pieces and contemporary graphics, in collaboration with internationally renowned artists. Each space is conceived to highlight the works and generate an immersive experience, giving developments a unique, culturally relevant, and visually powerful identity.

items.title: Regulatory – Comprehensive Regulatory Management
items.desc: We offer expert management in regulations, licenses, and legal compliance for real estate and construction developments. We ensure the legal and regulatory viability of each project, mitigating risks and accelerating processes through a strategic approach updated with local and international legal frameworks.

items.title: Construction – Technological and Global
items.desc: We connect a global network of builders (BGP) that guarantees quality and accelerated compliance. We integrate automation, robotics, and BIM technology to optimize each stage of development, reducing costs, improving precision, and raising efficiency standards in the construction industry.

items.title: Development – Disruptive Real Estate Model
items.desc: We revolutionize real estate development with a hypergrowth strategy based on global alliances, financial technologies such as blockchain, and hybrid land use models. We democratize investment through innovative financing schemes—self-funding, debt-funding, and crowdfunding—redefining how projects are built, financed, and scaled internationally.

items.title: Marketing – Data, Precision and Conversion
items.desc: We implement market intelligence based on big data and machine learning to segment with precision, predict opportunities, and maximize profitability. We combine omnichannel strategies—digital and in-person—with advanced targeting algorithms, accelerating sales closures in national and international markets.

items.title: Operation – Performance and Optimization
items.desc: We manage real estate assets with a centralized and tropicalized platform that maximizes operational performance according to the sector. Our solution allows operating residential, commercial, industrial, and tourist properties with multisectoral flexibility, integrating IoT and artificial intelligence for predictive maintenance and real-time optimization.
